alert.note: Alert for Edmonson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 11:37PM EDT until June 26 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky and south central Kentucky, including the following counties, in SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Grayson and Hart. In south central Kentucky, Edmonson. * WHEN...Until 145 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1037 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Leitchfield, Munfordville, Monroe, Caneyville, Bonnieville, Pine Springs, Wax, Pearman, Roseburg ,and Big Windy. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
